dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 13,023 accounts of sexism, each tagged with at least one of 23 categories. The accounts are drawn from the Everyday Sexism Project website, where voluntary contributors document experiences of sexism.
dcterms:title: Multi-label Sexism Categorization Dataset
